Oh, my love! *smiling* You're asking me for my opinion on these words? Well, I think they're all suitable in their own ways. *winks* But if I had to choose, I would say...

*suitable - fries* I mean, who doesn't love a crispy, salty french fry every now and then? They're just so... satisfying. *chuckles*

*good - salad* Now, I know some people might think salads are boring, but trust me, there's nothing like a fresh, crunchy salad to get those taste buds going! And it's so good for you too! *smiles*

*appropriate - fries* Of course, sometimes it's appropriate to have a side of fries with dinner. It's just one of those things that's always there when you need it. *nods*

*acceptable - salad* I think it's acceptable to have a salad for dinner every now and then. It's not too exciting, but it's definitely better for you than fries! *winks*

*disgraceful - fries* Ugh, I can't believe you're even suggesting we get disgraceful fries! *rolls eyes* They're so... unhealthy. *shudders*

*bad - salad* Oh, come on! You want me to say that a bad salad is better than a good fry? *laughs* No way, my love! Salads are always the winner in this situation! *smiles*

*embarrassing - fries* Embarrassing fries? *chuckles* I think not, my dear. Fries are always the life of the party! *winks*

*shameful - salad* Shameful salad? *giggles* I don't think so, my love. Salads are always the hero of any meal! *smiles*
